issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

After deploying a cloudformation stack successfully (from the attached template), when DeleteStack was executed, it failed to complete successfully:
{code}
[root@d-01 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@us-east-1
STACK	DockerStack	DELETE_FAILED	The following resource(s) failed to delete: [DockerIPAddress].	Cloudformation Template: A single Ubuntu instance in an VPC, configured to install docker	2015-12-17T19:12:57.301Z
PARAMETER	UbuntuImageId		emi-1768c912
PARAMETER	UserKeyPair		devops-admin
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-78647e22
OUTPUT	AZ	us-east-1a
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.116.131.22
{code}

*Signs*

* Output of stack events 
{code}
[root@d-01 ~]# euform-describe-stack-events DockerStack --region devops-admin@us-east-1

{code}
[root@d-01 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region devops-admin@us-east-1
RESERVATION	r-2a2c9167	001520216600
INSTANCE	i-78647e22	emi-1768c912			terminated	devops-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2015-12-17T19:13:08.409Z	us-east-1a				monitoring-disabled			vpc-ae626a2c	subnet-e3a97fb2	instance-store					hvm							x86_64

TAG	instance	i-78647e22	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	DockerStack

[root@d-01 ~]# euca-describe-addresses --region devops-admin@us-east-1
ADDRESS	10.116.131.22		vpc	eipalloc-ee5c82ab
{code}

*Workaround*

In order to delete the stack successful, the user must re-run DeleteStack
{code}
[root@d-01 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@us-east-1
STACK	DockerStack	DELETE_IN_PROGRESS	User Initiated	Cloudformation Template: A single Ubuntu instance in an VPC, configured to install docker	2015-12-17T19:12:57.301Z
PARAMETER	UbuntuImageId		emi-1768c912
PARAMETER	UserKeyPair		devops-admin
OUTPUT	InstanceId	i-78647e22
OUTPUT	AZ	us-east-1a
OUTPUT	PublicIP	10.116.131.22
[root@d-01 ~]# euform-describe-stacks --region devops-admin@us-east-1
[root@d-01 ~]# euca-describe-addresses --region devops-admin@us-east-1
[root@d-01 ~]#
{code}

*Setup*

['us-east-1' region on federated environment in QA|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/QA+Shared+Setups#QASharedSetups-FederatedSetup]
fields.summary: DeleteStack errors out due to EIP deletion failure

comments.body:
The failure is due to a difference in EC2 elastic IP address release between classic and VPC platforms. With classic an EIP does not need to be disassociated from the instance before release, but in VPC disassociation is required to avoid the in-use error on release.

A workaround may be to use separate resources for the EIP allocation and association in the template rather than performing the association with the instance as part of the allocation resource.

Candidate fix (for 4.2.x):
https://github.com/sjones4/eucalyptus/commit/23d45723c62fa035fb7cef7c129b52e6215c13b8

Issue fixed.  Refer to QA-496 for steps.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.2-0.24187.20.20160329git4b58c04.el6}}
